comments.body: samples on query locks on current subs and resource group. lock_facts should be used more widely than main module

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +61,65 @@    managed_resource_id: /subscriptions/xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx/resourcegroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVM

- name: List locks of myVM
  azure_rm_lock_facts:
    managed_resource_id: /subscriptions/xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx/resourcegroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVM
